ack.title: Acknowledgments
ack.p: The authors take this opportunity to express their sincere gratitude to the management of Plant Lipids (P) Ltd., Cochin, India to be a constant source of support and encouragement during this review and are honored and revered to work under them. We would also like to show our deep appreciation and indebtedness to laboratory members for their patience and co-operation throughout this review, as without their active help the completion of this undertaking would not have been accomplished.
